comments.body:
Resolver for non-promise api has a `cancel()` method documented, there is no such method documented for promise API resolver. Otherwise those Resolver classes have all methods matching. I did not check in node source if this is an error in documentation, of promise api Resolver class indeed does not have the `cancel()` method.

Anyway, it's not here, as I followed the node documentation.
set local address is not included in NodeJs 14. I think needs to wait until it's backported or till type definitions here are moved to v15 and v14 get their own folder like v12,...
